page.title: 14TRADE
page.content:
SINCE THE POST OFFICE CLOSED THERE IS NO VILLAGE SHOP SO PEOPLE HAVE TO SHOP IN OTHER VILLAGES OR TOWNS. THERE IS A MILKMAN WHO ALSO DELIVERS NEWSPAPERS, BREAD AND FRESH FISH DELIVERIES AND A MOBILE SHOP.
{LIBRARY}
A MOBILE LIBRARY VAN VISITS THE AREA ONCE PER MONTH WHEN MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY CAN CHOOSE HOWEVER MANY BOOKS THEY WISH FOR THAT PERIOD. A LIBRARIAN ALSO DELIVERS TO THE INFIRM DURING THIS ROUND.
{BUS SERVICE
A KINGS LYNN/NORWICH BUS RUNS AT INFREQUENT INTERVALS DURING THE DAY AND ON FRIDAY MORNING TWO COACHES RUN THROUGH DUNHAM AND FRANSHAM TO DEREHAM
